title.rendered: Swabhiman scholars go on an exposure visit to IBN 7 Network 18

content.rendered:
70 Swabhiman scholars recently visited the office and working premises of premier news channel IBN 7 Network 18 on the 16th and 17th of February 2017.

The girls were taken around and educated about the day to day functioning of the news room, shoots in studios etc. Managing Editor, Prabal Pratap conducted a Q&A session with the girls answering various queries about the procedure to read the news, fluency of language etc. The girls also interacted with two anchors of the news channel and also saw the office premises of the famous news channel CNN.
